      • saveQuota

        public void saveQuota(int endpointId,
                      Quota quota)
               throws ClientException
        Sets the data quota of the selected endpoint. If the quota already exists, only the provided values will be updated.
        Parameters:
        endpointId - endpoint identifier
        quota - endpoint quota data
        Throws:
        ClientException
